thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-HSBC Sells 4.7 Mln Subscription Rights Of Prisa For 3.0 Euros Per Right

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-HSBC Sells 4.7 Mln Subscription Rights Of Prisa For 3.0 Euros Per Right
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - HSBC:
* SAID ON MONDAY IT HAS SOLD 4.7 MILLION PRE-EMPTIVE SUBSCRIPTION RIGHTS OF PRISA AT A PRICE OF 3.0 EUROS PER SUBSCRIPTION RIGHT
* RAISED AGGREGATE GROSS SALE PROCEEDS OF APPROXIMATELY 14.1 MILLION EUROS THROUGH THE PLACING
* ACTED AS SOLE BOOKRUNNER IN CONNECTION WITH THE PLACING Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
